Subject: Hey all!

Hi!  I just Joined to this list. I love gladiator.  I have been using the editor recently and I have built some challenging stages.  If you would like a copy.  E-mail me.  My favorite character is the Cleric.  I can't wait until the new Gladiator-Beyond Freedom comes out.  Well. See you all.  Write Back
